trans-unit.source: Update the quickstart client app to capture and upload images
trans-unit.target: Update the quickstart client app to capture and upload images

trans-unit.source: In this section you will update the project from the [Get started with Mobile Services] tutorial to take photos and upload them to Azure Blob Storage.
trans-unit.target: In this section you will update the project from the [Get started with Mobile Services] tutorial to take photos and upload them to Azure Blob Storage.

trans-unit.source: To capture the image, this tutorial uses the [CameraCaptureTask] from the `Microsoft.Phone.Tasks` namespace.
trans-unit.target: To capture the image, this tutorial uses the [CameraCaptureTask] from the `Microsoft.Phone.Tasks` namespace.

trans-unit.source: This class launches the camera UI on the Windows Phone device to capture the photo and automatically saves the image to the Camera Roll on the Windows Phone device.
trans-unit.target: This class launches the camera UI on the Windows Phone device to capture the photo and automatically saves the image to the Camera Roll on the Windows Phone device.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the images saved to the Camera Roll, use the [PhotoCamera] class in the `Microsoft.Devices` namespace instead.
trans-unit.target: If you do not want the images saved to the Camera Roll, use the [PhotoCamera] class in the `Microsoft.Devices` namespace instead.

trans-unit.source: In the Solution Explorer for Visual Studio, under the project, expand **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: In the Solution Explorer for Visual Studio, under the project, expand **Properties**.

trans-unit.source: Then open the WMAppManifest.xml file and on the **Capabilities** tab enable the camera by clicking **ID\_CAP\_ISV\_CAMERA**.
trans-unit.target: Then open the WMAppManifest.xml file and on the **Capabilities** tab enable the camera by clicking **ID\_CAP\_ISV\_CAMERA**.

trans-unit.source: Close the file to save your change.
trans-unit.target: Close the file to save your change.

trans-unit.source: This makes sure that your app can use a camera attached to the computer.
trans-unit.target: This makes sure that your app can use a camera attached to the computer.

trans-unit.source: Users will be requested to allow camera access the first time that the app is run.
trans-unit.target: Users will be requested to allow camera access the first time that the app is run.
